en: Darkness is unleashed in a world where humans and animals succumb to madness.\nOnly sorcerers can stop the plague.
es: La oscuridad está desatada en un mundo donde humanos y animales sucumben a la locura.\nSolo los hechiceros pueden detener la plaga.
ca: La foscor està desfermada en un món on humans i animals sucumbeixen a la bogeria.\nNomés els bruixots poden aturar la plaga.

fr: Mettez le focus ici pour choisir le contrôle.

keys: Are you sure you want to remove {key} from {action}?
en: Are you sure you want to remove {key} from {action}?
fr: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer {key} pour {action} ?

keys: Do you want to reset your game data?
en: Do you want to reset your game data?
es: ¿Quieres restablecer los datos de tu juego?
ca: Vols restablir les dades del teu joc?

keys: Do you want to level up?
en: Do you want to level up?
fr: Do you want to level up?

keys: The area has been healed. Congratulations!
en: The area has been healed. Congratulations!
fr: The area has been healed. Congratulations!
ca: La zona ha estat curada. Felicitats!

keys: The school must improve to quell all diseases.
en: The school must improve to quell all diseases.
fr: The school must improve to quell all diseases.
es: La escuela debe mejorar para aplacar todas las enfermedades
ca: L'escola ha de millorar per curar totes les enfermetats

keys: Each turn you can improve knowledge
en: Each turn you can improve knowledge
fr: Each turn you can improve knowledge
es: Cada turno se puede mejorar un conocimiento
ca: Cada torn es pot millorar un coneixement

keys: You must click on the room.
en: You must click on the room.
fr: You must click on the room.
es: Debes hacer click en la habitación
ca: Has de fer click a l'habitació

keys: increase the level of each type of magic
en: increase the level of each type of magic
fr: increase the level of each type of magic
es: aumenta el nivel de cada tipo de magia
ca: augmenta el nivell de cada tipus de magia

keys: When you have the necessary knowledge you can
en: When you have the necessary knowledge you can
fr: When you have the necessary knowledge you can

keys: Each level of magic type will give you more
en: Each level of magic type will give you more
fr: Each level of magic type will give you more
es: Cada nivel de tipo de magia te dará más
ca: Cada nivell de tipus de màgia et donarà

keys: Click on the purple areas of the map to heal them
en: Click on the purple areas of the map to heal them
fr: Click on the purple areas of the map to heal them
es: Haz click en las zonas moradas del mapa para aplacar las enfermedades
ca: Fes click en les zones porpres del mapa per curar les enfermetats
